revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Relic Castle |image = [[File:Relic Castle.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Relic Castle. |tokens = 166,500 |location = Unova Route D.R. }} '''Relic Castle''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 3,003,000 HP. ==Encounter Tables== ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew || rowspan=3|[[File:Psychic_(female).png|40px]] Psychic Dua || rowspan=3|[[File:Gothita.png|40px]] Gothita |- | [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sandslash |- | [[File:Sandile.png|40px]] Sandile |- | [[File:Baltoy.png|40px]] Baltoy || rowspan=3|[[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Low || rowspan=3|[[File:Solosis.png|40px]] Solosis |- | [[File:Krokorok.png|40px]] Krokorok |- | [[File:Yamask.png|40px]] Yamask |} ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Volcarona.png|40px]] Volcarona ||
21,000,000 || [[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Perry || [[File:Sigilyph.png|40px]] Sigilyph ||
16,000,000 |- |} ==Items== ¨ {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 18.74% || 18.00% || 15.00% |- | {{Bag2|Mago}} || 2 || 37.48% || 36.00% || 30.00% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 18.74% || 18.00% || 15.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.73% || 3.33% |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.73% || 3.33% |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.73% || 3.33% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.20% || 0.32% || 0.80% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.20% || 0.32% || 0.80% |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || 2 || 0.40% || 0.64% || 1.60% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.20% || 0.32% || 0.80% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.11% || 0.53% |- | {{Pokemon|Darmanitan (Zen)|Mimic}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.11% || 0.53% |} After Reaching Galar, the drop chance for items in Unova will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
'''*Note:''' Darmanitan (Zen) does not get debuffed! {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 18.75% || 18.75% || 18.75% |- | {{Bag2|Mago}} || 2 || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 18.75% || 18.75% || 18.75% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || N/A || 0.30% || 0.30% || 0.30% |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || N/A || 0.30% || 0.30% || 0.30% |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || N/A || 0.30% || 0.30% || 0.30% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.02% || 0.02% || 0.02% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.02% || 0.02% || 0.02% |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || 2 || 0.04% || 0.04% || 0.04% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.02% || 0.02% || 0.02% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Pokemon|Darmanitan (Zen)|Mimic}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.11% || 0.53% |} {{Unova Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #5 - Unova^e]]
